lyrics:
To Love Somebody Lyrics[Verse 1]
There's a light
A certain kind of light
That never shown on me
I want my life to be
Lived with you
Lived with you
There's a way
Everybody says
To do each and every little thing

[Pre-Chorus]
But what does it bring
If I ain't got you
If I ain't got you
[Chorus]
Baby you don't know what its like
Baby you don't know what its like
To love somebody
To love somebody
The way I love you

[Verse 2]
In my mind
I see your face again
I know my frame of mind
You ain't got to be so blind
But I'm blind
So very blind
I'm a man
Can't you see what I am
I live and breathe and for you

[Pre-Chorus]
But what good does it do
If I ain't got you
If I ain't got you

[Chorus]
Baby you don't know what its like
Baby you don't know what its like
To love somebody
To love somebody
The way I love you
Oh yeah
You don't know what its like
Baby you don't know what its like
To love somebody
To love somebodyEmbed
